column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The real fail here was the bone in Delmonico Strip and Filet!!! The pomme frites just blah. There is a funky weird flavoring to this meat that just pretty much ruined it. I've never had this taste nor tasted it on any meat
column2: and guess what? After dessert and another drink
column3: it was still there. Just not good. Like the service. I tipped the runner because I saw my waiter twice. Both times to place drink/dinner orders and it was not because they were busy
